choices.label: The magnitude of the net magnetic field at point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will decrease by a factor of two.

content.answer: The magnitude of the net magnetic field at point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will increase by a factor of two.
